  <title>Subbasins.shp</title>
  <abstract>Shapefile belonging to the paper "LamaH | Large-Sample Data for Hydrology and Environmental Sciences for Central Europe", submitted to the journal ESSD (Earth System Science Data) in March 2021.

The features in this shapefile show the merged subbasins from the datasets:
- Digital Hydrological Atlas of Austria (HAO, 2007; full expansion)
- HydroATLAS (Linke et al., 2019; region which is not covered by HAO)

Attributes:
"HYDROID" - unique identifier
"NEXTDOWNID" - next downstream HYDROID
"region" - name of river region according to Table B1 of the mentioned paper

References:
HAO: Hydrological Atlas of Austria (digHAO), 3. Delivery, Federal Ministry of Agriculture, Regions and Tourism â€“ Hydrographic Central Office, Vienna, Austria, ISBN 3-85437-250-7, 2007.
Linke, S., Lehner, B., Ouellet Dallaire, C., Ariwi, J., Grill, G., Anand, M., Beames, P., Burchard-Levine, V., Maxwell, S., Moidu, H., Tan, F., and Thieme, M.: Global hydro-environmental sub-basin and river reach characteristics at high spatial resolution, Scientific Data, 6, 283, https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-019-0300-6, 2019.</abstract>
